thread.title: Woman posts video of iPhone 7 Plus catching fire, Apple to investigate the matter
thread.title_full: Woman posts video of iPhone 7 Plus catching fire, Apple to investigate the matter - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Woman posts video of iPhone 7 Plus catching fire, Apple to investigate the matter
text:
Brianna Olivas has claimed that her iPhone 7 Plus exploded on Saturday started spewing smoke. (Source: Twitter) A woman named Brianna Olivas has claimed that her iPhone 7 Plus exploded on Saturday and started spewing smoke. She posted a video of the entire incident on social media website Twitter and revealed that the explosion happened even though she wasn’t using the phone. Her tweet read as, “So my iPhone 7 plus blew up this morning ???? was not even using it, literally no explanation for this.”
The 21 second video posted on twitter shows flames coming out of the phone and has been viewed over 1.91 million times. More than 25,000 Twitter users have also re-tweeted the video. According to the latest reports, Apple has recovered the phone from the woman and is investigating the issue.
So my IPhone 7 plus blew up this morning ???? was not even using it, literally no explanation for this pic.twitter.com/sQ8CJt4Y69
— Bree✨ (@briannaolivas_) February 23, 2017
